experience: You and Aniket both know Rama Bokka, Simon Chen, and 2 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

•	Design and development of Restful distributed services in C# .NET for core trading operations and support for consuming channels like Schwab.com, Schwab Mobile, Schwab Advisor Center and Schwab Client Reps.•	Development of Distributed .NET applications to handle MQ events for Batch processing of trading operations.•	Design, development and deployment of Portfolio Management System with AngularJS for front-end technology and Java 8 Microservices with Spring framework deployed on Pivotal cloud for back-end technology.•	Development and deployment of SSIS packages to move large datasets between databases to support migration.•	Improve documentation, code quality, performance monitoring (App Dynamics), unit testing and efficient logging mechanisms (Splunk).

•	Assist in the design, development and maintenance of products using J2EE technologies.•	Built, tested and deployed scalable, highly available and modular software products.•	Modified existing software to correct errors, adapt to new hardware and improve performance.•	Provide production support: troubleshoot, analyze and resolve system issues.
KJ Somaiya College of Engineering, Vidyavihar

•	Digital Signal and Image Processing•	Robotics and Artificial Intelligence•	Mobile Computing•	System Security•	Distributed Computing•	Multimedia System Design•	Software Architecture•	Advanced Internet Technology•	Advanced Database Management System•	Advanced Computer Networks•	System Programming and Compiler Construction
recommendations: Senior Manager - Software Development at Charles Schwab

Aniket is a very competent developer and it was my pleasure to have such a dedicated and talented developer on my team. He is great at taking initiatives, ownership and is able to accomplish complex technical tasks with very little direction. Aniket is not only technically strong but he gained incredible amount of business acumen in short period of time working on one of the most visible project on Portfolio Management team at Charles Schwab.  Aniket closely collaborated with product owners, peers and technical leads to ensure features delivered not only met business requirements but also met technical and quality expectations. Aniket is always looking for ways to come up with a creative solution for challenging problems. He has lot of potential as he continues to grow in his career.
